nodes.text: Apprentice Legislators were the members of the Apprentice Legislature, an organization for politically-minded youth. The position existed in the governments of both the Galactic Republic and its successors state, the Galactic Empire. Padmé Naberrie joined the Apprentice Legislators on Naboo at the age of eight. Amidala's daughter, Princess Leia Organa, later served as an Apprentice Legislator during the reign of the Empire.
